titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-methyl-4-methoxy-6-methylamino-1,3,5-triazine.
To extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-methyl-4-methoxy-6-methylamino-1,3,5-triazine.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on 2-methyl-4-methoxy-6-methylamino-1,3,5-triazine.
